name: Find MV
description:
This game is an attempt to deconstruct and look at the base gameplay of Metroidvanias. This involves using what amounts to keys to access new areas and  to find secrets using player driven backtracking. 

The controls are WASD to move, space to jump, enter to pause. Movement controls can be changed to arrow keys in the pause menu.

Leave a comment on if you think this accomplished what it set out to do.

Made in GameMaker Studio 1.4
